questions.question: Where can you go to acquire the goods and services that will satisfy your needs?
questions.answer: In order to acquire the goods and services that will satisfy the various needs that you have in your life, you have six concentric circles or realms to explore.  Beginning in the center and radiating outwards, these realms are:

questions.question: Why is CommuniTrader compared to a tent sale in your backyard??
questions.answer: CommuniTrader.com is a trading platform that creates a novel type of private marketplace where you can find in one place a trove of excess and underutilized goods and services belonging to the members of the communities and groups that comprise your unique world.

questions.question: How does CommuniTrader relate to my needs and my feelings?
questions.answer: Most people do not seek to acquire goods and services simply for the sake of having more stuff.  Rather such resources are sought as a means of meeting needs that we wish to satisfy.   CommuniTrader.com allows you to search for resources in your Communities on the basis of your perceived needs

questions.question: How does CommuniTrader help me manage the resources in my life?
questions.answer: One of the most significant and time-consuming tasks you face in life is acquiring the goods and services that you have determined will satisfy your physical, emotional, and social needs.  Along with this task come several important subtasks that will be discussed below.

questions.question: How do the privileges and restrictions differ between Personal Traders, Nonprofit Traders, and Business Traders?
questions.answer: In order to acquire the goods and services that will satisfy the various needs that you have in your life, you have six concentric circles or realms to explore.  Beginning in the center and radiating outwards, these realms are:

questions.question: Why might an individual want to sign up on CommuniTrader.com?
questions.answer: A question worth considering is, where do you go to acquire the goods, services, and support you need to achieve the goals in your life?  We would suggest that your options are limited to five principal, what we might call, Resource Realms.

questions.question: Why might a local business want to sign up for CommuniTrader?
questions.answer: There are several reasons why a local business merchant, service provider, or professional might want to sign up as a Business Trader on CommuniTrader.com.

questions.question: Why might an NPO want to register on CommuniTrader.com?
questions.answer: One of the most significant and time-consuming tasks you face in life is acquiring the goods and services that you have determined will satisfy your physical, emotional, and social needs.  Along with this task come several important subtasks that will be discussed below.

questions.question: What are the differences between my three types of Trade Partners: Community, Direct Nonprofit, and Direct Business?
questions.answer: Your Community Trade Partners are Personal Traders, Nonprofit Traders and Business Traders who have joined one or more of the same Communities that you have joined.

questions.question: How do I identify potential Communities with which to trade?
questions.answer: You might want to sit down and make a list of all of the activities that you do with others and the names of those groups or communities in which you do them.  The list could include family groups, groups of friends, your neighborhood, your school, your work place, your house of worship, your clubs, your teams, etc.  Then rate each one on a scale of 1-5 how much you would like to increase the number and quality of the connections that you have with its members.  1 = Not At All and 5 = Very Much.  The groups that you scored the highest are the ones you should consider joining first.

questions.question: How do I register a Community?
questions.answer: If you would like to trade with one of the groups in your life as a Community on CommuniTrader.com, the first step you should take is to ascertain whether the group has already been registered by another Trader.  To find out, you can (1) ask other members of the group and/or (2) search for the group using the CommuniTrader Community Search Engine.

questions.question: What are the duties and responsibilities of the Super Admin and the Admin of a Community?
questions.answer: The following table shows the respective duties and responsibilities of the Registrant, the Super Admin, and the Admin of a Community.  When a Trader registers a Community, he is initially automatically assigned to all three roles.  Thereafter, as the Super Admin, he can reassign the roles of Super Admin and/or Admin as he wishes by clicking on Trade Partners > Communities > [Name of Community] > Directory of Traders > [Trader's Name] > Status.

questions.question: What kinds of goods should I trade on CommuniTrader.com?
questions.answer: When it comes to their possessions, people increasingly are discovering that.  Take a critical look at your possessions, one by one, and ask yourself honestly how much satisfaction any particular item brings you.  Might it make somebody else in one of your Communities happier than it makes you?  Do you really want to keep this for yourself?  Might this item be better off

questions.question: What kinds of services should I offer in My Showcase?
questions.answer: Chances are that you like doing and are good at something that others in your Communities do not like doing or do not have time to do or don't know how to do.  And vice-versa.  These are the kind of valuable services that you and your Trade Partners can list on CommuniTrader as Services for Sale, for Free, or to Donate.  Think gardening, house repairs, cooking, sewing, babysitting, chauffeuring, reading, writing, tutoring, etc.  Under-utilized skills and knowledge are one of the great untapped resources in our Communities.  Once excavated through a tool like CommuniTrader, they can bring enormous satisfaction both to the providers and the recipients and strengthen your Communities to boot.

questions.question: Why might I want to accept Trade Dollars instead of cash for my goods and services?
questions.answer: While at first blush it may seem tempting to set the Maximum Percent Trade Dollars (MPTD) of your Listings for sale and for rent at zero (0) percent, experience shows that the higher the MPTD, the greater the quantity of goods and services exchanged.  That is chieflly because your market is not limited to only those buyers who have cash at their disposal.  Over time you will come to appreciate that the value of the Trade Dollars you accumulate is equivalent to the value of cash for all trades you make on CommuniTrader.
